commands.question: Claude doesn't recognize commands
commands.solution: Ensure CLAUDE.md is at project root and .claude/ directory exists. Restart Claude Code CLI.

style.question: Generated code doesn't match my style
style.solution: Customize .claude/rules/ with your code patterns and update constitution.md with your principles.

tests.question: Tests are failing after implementation
tests.solution: Check BDD scenarios in spec. Ensure test framework is configured correctly. Run orchestrator to break into smaller tasks.

specs.question: Specs are too verbose / not detailed enough
specs.solution: Adjust complexity in constitution.md: LOW = minimal chapters (only 6, 10), MEDIUM = standard (3, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10), HIGH = all 12 Arc42 chapters.

migration.question: How do I migrate an existing project?
migration.solution: Start with /vision to document the existing system. Use /container to document each main component. Refactor gradually using documentation-first. See recipe: "Migrating Legacy Code".
